txt.en: 'While I'm figuring out this locket, I could use your help with something. I was scouting the area on this elevated walkway, being careful to stay out of sight, and saw an odd shadow moving about down below. It moved like a large spider, but I can't be certain what it was. Its shape wasn't like other spiders around here.\n\n'Could you find out what it was? I got shivers when I saw it crawling about, and I've had nightmares ever since! If you find more than one, can you make sure they don't get close enough to find me here? I need to concentrate on the locket!'

You tell Knakk that it seems like some kind of fungus is spreading and infecting the eastern Redhorn.

'The oddly shaped creature I spotted was an infected spider? You say even the ground is infected in that area?! What are we dealing with?

'This is troubling indeed.'

There are oddly shaped creatures wandering about to the east and south-east. Knakk swore he spotted a creature that slightly resembled a spider. But being alone way out here, he is trying to stay out of sight on the elevated walkway, and didn't get a good view.
The oddly shaped shadows that Knakk referred to can be found to the east and south-east of where he is camped, up on the elevated walkway in the north-east corner of Redhorn Lodes.
Knakk is camped on the elevated walkway in the north-east corner of Redhorn Lodes.\n\nHe will be eager to hear what you found while exploring the eastern side of Redhorn Lodes.
